sentences: Ta on veelgi parem kui ma arvasin.
See teema on veelgi olulisem kui tundus.
Pärast seda saavutust meie meeskond on veelgi kindlam võitude ees.
context: The Estonian word 'veelgi' is an adverb used to indicate that something exists or happens to a greater degree than previously mentioned. It emphasizes that the quality, quantity, or state has increased beyond what was already stated. This word often appears in comparative contexts and helps convey progression or intensification of characteristics.
